Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: ~denyeart if we aren't shipping Java CC, then shouldn't this be for a Future release?

Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: Agreed, this one can go in when java chaincode goes live, I'll mark it for 1.1.

Action.author: mastersingh24
Action.body: Changing this to 1.2 given Java CC is at best still experimental for v1.1

Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: Changed to Medium since Java chaincode is not a production feature as of 1.1.
